binding.label: Click to open or close the canopy
Parking brakes: %s
Selected fuel tank: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['LEFT MAIN', 'RIGHT MAIN', 'FUSELAGE', 'LEFT DROP', 'RIGHT DROP']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Coolant: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['CLOSED', 'OFF (close guard for AUTOMATIC)', 'OPEN', 'AUTOMATIC']; return modes[arg[0]+1];

binding.label: Oil: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['CLOSED', 'OFF (close guard for AUTOMATIC)', 'OPEN', 'AUTOMATIC']; return modes[arg[0]+1];

binding.label: Supercharger: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['LOW (better range at high altitude)', 'AUTO', 'HIGH']; return modes[arg[0]+1];

binding.label: Guns: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['CAMERA AND SIGHT', 'OFF', 'GUNS, CAMERA, AND SIGHT']; return modes[arg[0]+1];

binding.label: Selected weapons: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['SAFE', 'BOMBS BOTH', 'BOMBS TRAIN', 'ROCKETS']; return modes[arg[0]];
